name: ExtensionConfig.Media.Queues.ContentProtectionKey.Cks
desc: Configuration details for your service’s content protection system.

items.name: certUrl
items.desc: The URL of the certicate the client must use to sign requests to the contentProtectionKey endpoint. For more information, see Retrieve an Asset’s Content Protection Key.

items.name: keySystem
items.desc: The content’s encryption type. The only supported value is ContentKeySystemFairPlayStreaming.
